wikipedia_page.main: Callum Ilott (born 11 November 1998) is a British racing driver competing in the NTT IndyCar Series for Juncos Hollinger Racing. He was the official reserve driver for Alfa Romeo for the 2021 Formula One World Championship season. Ilott was the runner-up in the 2020 Formula 2 Championship, to Mick Schumacher. He is currently a member of the Ferrari Driver Academy, whilst racing in Indycar in 2022.
